name: Hash Vault Dark
description:
Dark theme I made for the Hash Vault mining pools. It works out of the box for all of them so far.

Suggestions? Issues? Did I miss something? Contact me via one of a few methods, found on my contact page: https://www.techjargaming.com/contact/

Like this style a lot and feel the urge to donate? Send me some cryptocurrency!
